cause.description:
It's not possible to make the donation button work, becuase it is linked to the American Just Giving, not the UK one. Please go to http://www.justgiving.com/facebook-cry to donate.
CRY is a charity founded in May 1995 to raise awareness of Cardiac Risk in the Young - Sudden Cardiac Death (SCD), Sudden Death Syndrome (SDS, SADS).
CRY offers support to those who have suffered a loss through a network of affected families & counselling.
CRY promotes heart screening, ECG Testing Programmes & contributes to medical research.
CRY has donated medical equipment to doctors' surgeries and hospitals.
CRY funds the CRY Centre for Sports Cardiology at the Olympic Medical Institute.
1. Every week 8 'apparently' fit and healthy young people die in the UK from undiagnosed heart conditions.
2. CRY holds ECG screening clinics for those aged 14 to 35 at three locations in the UK
3. http://www.c-r-y.org.uk/
cause.mission: Reduce the number of 'apparently' fit and healthy young people that die from undiagnosed heart conditions.
cause.name: CRY - Cardiac Risk in the Young
